SELECT e.id, e.title, e.summary, e.event_time, f.file_path AS bannerUrl
, CASE WHEN b.user_id IS NOT NULL THEN true ELSE false END AS isBookMarked
FROM event e LEFT JOIN event_image f ON e.banner_id = f.id
LEFT JOIN event_user_bookmark b ON e.id = b.event_id AND b.user_id = #{userId}
WHERE e.is_deleted = 0 AND DATE_ADD(e.event_time, INTERVAL 1 DAY) <= NOW() ORDER BY e.event_time DESC

SELECT e.id, e.title, e.summary, e.location, e.event_time, f.file_path AS bannerUrl
, CASE WHEN b.user_id IS NOT NULL THEN true ELSE false END AS isBookMarked
FROM event e LEFT JOIN event_image f ON e.banner_id = f.id
LEFT JOIN event_user_bookmark b ON e.id = b.event_id AND b.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT e.id, e.title, e.content, e.event_time, e.location, e.banner_id, e.link, e.category_id, e.video_link as videoLink, c.name AS categoryName, f.file_path AS bannerUrl
, CASE WHEN b.user_id IS NOT NULL THEN true ELSE false END AS isBookMarked
FROM event e
LEFT JOIN event_image f ON e.banner_id = f.id
LEFT JOIN event_user_bookmark b ON e.id = b.event_id AND b.user_id = #{userId}
LEFT JOIN category c on e.category_id = c.id WHERE e.id = #{id} AND e.is_deleted = 0
